local_intent: Transfer/place grasped white plate onto red_plate: ensure red_plate visible (scan if needed), move above, align, lower until contact, release, and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already grasped and held by the gripper
Vision pipeline available to detect the red_plate
Workspace remains clear for lowering and retreat
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: perceives red_plate, moves above, aligns, lowers until contact, opens gripper to release, and retreats per GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION stepwise plan.
